testsuite.name: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: And I choose creating new lesson in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: And Lesson Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: When I click on the Properties tab
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: Then I see that the show launch page checkbox is set to false
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: When I click the Advanced Policies button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: Then I am on the Advanced Policies Editor page
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: When I click the Design button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: Then I see the Remove Criterion button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: When I click the Back button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: Then I am on the Policy Editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: And I see that the show launch page checkbox is set to true
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: And I see that the show launch page checkbox is disabled
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: Verify the Show Launch Page policy checkbox is disabled when the lesson has advanced policies
